content: Yes, I can suggest "The 5 Second Rule: Transform your Life, Work, and Confidence with Everyday Courage" by Mel Robbins. The book helps readers to overcome fear and anxiety by using the "5-second rule" which is a technique that involves counting backward from five to one and taking action. The book contains a lot of practical tips and actionable steps to help readers change their behavior and become more confident. With this book, readers will learn how to overcome anxiety and self-doubt, build courage, and develop a growth mindset. It's a great personal development book for anyone who wants to make positive changes in their life but doesn't want to focus on spirituality.
